item.title: LookOnChain: Upbit will list SYRUP
item.description: On July 25th, according to an official announcement, Upbit will list trading pairs of Maple Finance (SYRUP) in KRW, BTC, and USDT. Additionally, it will list trading pairs of Huma Finance (HUMA) in BTC and USDT.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Market Greed Index Cools Down, Today's Fear and Greed Index at 70
item.description: On July 25th, according to alternative data, the Fear and Greed Index of cryptocurrencies today is 70 (yesterday it was 71), indicating a slight decline in the "greed" sentiment in the market.Note: The Fear and Greed Index has a threshold ranging from 0 to 100 and incorporates the following indicators: Volatility (25%) + Market Trading Volume (25%) + Social Media Hype (15%) + Market Surveys (15%) + Bitcoin's Dominance in the Market (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).

item.title: A-share Cryptocurrency Sector Sees Volatility and Strength, with Dongxin Heping Hitting the Limit Up
item.description: On July 25th, based on market data, the A-share cryptocurrency sector showed fluctuations and strengthened. Dongxin Hengping reached the daily limit, Zhongke Jincai rose more than 5%, and Small Commodity City, New Morning Technology, and Taiji Shares followed suit. (Jinse)

item.title: Tether Releases XAUT Audit Report: Supported by Over 7.66 Tons of Physical Gold Reserves
item.description: On July 25th, according to official channels, Tether has made public the latest audit report regarding its gold-tokenized product, Tether Gold (XAUT), which is as of June 30, 2025. The current circulating supply of this product amounts to 246,524.330 tokens.The report indicates that each XAUT token is backed by a 1:1 ratio of physical gold reserves. These gold reserves are safely stored in a first-class facility within a dedicated vault in Switzerland. The circulating XAUT tokens are backed by more than 7.66 tons of physical gold.

item.title: Two "Bitcoin Kidnapping Torture Case" Suspects Granted Bail in Manhattan Court
item.description: On July 25th, as per the report by protos, two men who were accused of kidnapping a Bitcoin trader and attempting to make him hand over his private keys by using a chainsaw, a firearm, and a stun gun have been granted bail.A Manhattan judge gave the green light to release John Woeltz and William Duplessie on $1 million bail each on Wednesday. These two men are facing a total of 12 charges and both have pleaded not guilty. The court also mandated that they wear electronic monitoring devices and surrender their passports.Woeltz and Duplessie have been in custody since May of this year. Prosecutors have alleged that the two men lured an unidentified Italian crypto trader to Woeltz's townhouse in SoHo and illegally detained him there for two weeks. During this period, they subjected him to various forms of torture, including using a firearm, a stun gun, and a chainsaw. They even poured tequila on him and set him on fire.

item.title: Three new addresses holding 74,207 ETH, approximately $273 million
item.description: On July 25th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, within the past 10 hours, 3 new wallets have acquired an additional 74,207 ETH (approximately $2.73 billion). From July 9th onwards, a total of 8 new wallets have acquired a total of 540,460 ETH (approximately $19.9 billion).

item.title: CryptoQuant CEO: Bitcoin Cycle Theory has Become Outdated, Rise of Institutional Long-Term Holders
item.description: On July 25th, Ki Young Ju, the founder and CEO of CryptoQuant, stated in a post on the X platform that the "Bitcoin cycle theory has failed. My previous predictions were based on this theory - buy when whales start accumulating and sell when retail investors start entering. But this pattern is no longer valid.""In the previous cycle, whales sold coins to retail investors. However, this time, old whales sold coins to new long-term holders. The scale of institutional investment far exceeded our expectations. Trading has become meaningless, and now the number of holders has surpassed the number of traders. I overlooked this structural change when making the call for the end of the bull market."

item.title: An Ethereum Whale Sells 3459 ETH, Loses $35,000
item.description: On July 25th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a certain whale sold 3459 ETH in a short-term period 11 hours ago (approximately $12.58 million), incurring a loss of $35,000. The remaining part is still staked in ether.fi.

item.title: 「Brother Big Brother」 Huang Licheng Holds and Longs PUMP, with a total unrealized loss of over $10 million
item.description: On July 25th, according to the monitoring of LookOnChain, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng is currently longing for PUMP on Hyperliquid. The position has a realized loss of $8.14 million, and there is a $2.17 million unrealized loss in the spot position. He is still actively adding to the PUMP long position.

item.title: Shitcoin Downtrend Continues, SPK Plunges Over 32% in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 25th, according to HTX market data, the altcoin market continued to decline, and the following situations are as follows:The SPK fell by more than 32% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.112;The SAHARA dropped by more than 30% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.09468;The PENGU dropped by more than 13% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.0366;The FXS dropped by more than 13% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $3.192.
